Goals for this year


Hello, I'm Rashad, and I am passionate about creating gorgeous user experiences. I have decided to start journaling my experiences as an engineer and creator, particularly as someone with a highly non-traditional path to the world of engineering. Recently, I lost my job with JPMorgan Chase after almost three years.

Since losing my job, I have been reflecting on my career path and considering this as an opportunity to steer my career in the direction it should go. I know I am talented in many different dimensions, and I need to showcase that and monetize it.

I plan on taking my logo here:

and creating a 3D version of it. I will animate it and give it a nice setting and 3D UI. There is a growing demand for 3D skills combined with JavaScript expertise, and I will be discussing my adventures in this area here on my blog.

I am also planning to create an eCommerce site featuring Afrocentric avant-garde art, showcasing some of the work I have been creating over the last few years. During COVID, I returned to art as a way to cope and for therapy. Here are some examples on Instagram:

My Instagram

In addition, I am freelancing, creating logos, websites, and assisting folks in building their online brands.

I am quite excited about the new website you are visiting right now. Thank you for showing interest in me and my work. I consider myself a pretty interesting individual with plenty to share. I look forward to sharing my musings and works in progress with you. If you are in need of a software engineer and artist, let me know.
